:v-model.description: Use a v-model to display a searchable and selectable list of commands.
:v-model.description_zh: 使用 v-model 显示可搜索和可选择的命令列表。

emptyState.type: { icon: string; label: string; queryLabel: string; }
emptyState.default: {"icon": "i-heroicons-magnifying-glass-20-solid", "label": "We couldn't find any items.", "queryLabel": "We couldn't find any items with that term. Please try again."}
emptyState.description: An empty state will be displayed when there are no results.
emptyState.description_zh: 当没有结果时，将显示空状态。

slots.name: <group>-icon
slots.description: Use the #<group>-icon slot to override the left command content which display by default the icon, avatar and chip
slots.description_zh: 使用 #<group>-icon 插槽覆盖左侧命令内容，默认显示图标、头像和芯片

slots.name: <group>-command
slots.description: Use the #<group>-command slot to override the command content which display by default the prefix, suffix and label (customizable through the command-attribute prop).
slots.description_zh: 使用 #-command <group>插槽覆盖命令内容，默认显示前缀、后缀和标签（可通过 command-attribute 属性属性自定义）。

slots.name: <group>-active
slots.description: Use the #<group>-active slot to override the right command content (when hovered) which display by default the active field of the group if provided.
slots.description_zh: 使用 #<group>-active 插槽覆盖正确的命令内容（悬停时），默认情况下显示组的活动字段（如果提供）。

slots.name: <group>-inactive
slots.description: Use the #<group>-inactive slot to override the right command content (when not hovered) which display by default the inactive field of the group if provided or the shortcuts of the command.
slots.description_zh: 使用 #<group>-inactive 插槽覆盖正确的命令内容（未悬停时），默认情况下显示组的非活动字段（如果提供）或命令的快捷方式。

slots.name: empty-state
slots.description: Use the #empty-state slot to customize the empty state.
slots.description_zh: 使用 #empty 状态插槽自定义空状态。
